name: marfoldi
body:
### Hi!
My name is Péter Bence Márföldi, I do not use my middle name (Bence), so just call me Péter. I am doing my MSc in computer science at [Eötvös Loránd University](http://inf.elte.hu/). Mostly, I use Java for my work, but I also have some C++ experience. You can check my [GitHub repository](https://github.com/) if you are intrested in my recent projects.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
